Yang Hyong Sop Meets New Malaysian Ambassador
   Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Rahimi Bin Harun, Malaysian ambassador newly accredited to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.
